channel.title: Need help plz
channel.description: ok well in my server people are like complaining "can u update ranged" and whatnot...well i was wondering if any1 can gimme a tut or sometin on how to make it so that my d bow will shoot arrows and actaully give ranged exp instead of like combat exp...also i wanna know how to make the rune cbow shoot bolts instead of doing the same thing my d bow does
